trans-unit.source: Note that when installed as an egg file, changes made to the source code will
trans-unit.target: 달걀 파일로 설치하면 소스 코드를 변경하면

trans-unit.source: RunPython -m easy_install --editable -b . Chandler_AmazonPlugin==dev
trans-unit.target: RunPython -m easy_install --editable -b. Chandler_AmazonPlugin == dev

trans-unit.source: RunPython setup.py develop
trans-unit.target: RunPython setup.py 개발

trans-unit.source: The Amazon Plug-in is an experimental plug-in, created early on to demonstrate some of the things
